name: Embalmed Servant
desc: A dumb, rotting reanimated corpse wrapped in embalment bandages.

name: Nightfoot Elf
desc: A pariah among his people, this elf has left his home behind to join the community of criminals that lurks in the shadows.

name: Possessed Gauntlet
desc: A piece of abandoned armor that has been inhabited by a lowly demonic spirit.

name: Greater Djinn
effect: +1 Guard and +1 Vitality for every Demon Grunt that you control that is in the same Zone.

name: Wandering Banshee
effect: If there is a space available, this card can move instantly to any Zone inhabited by an allied Specter-type Creature

name: Ominous Wolf
effect: When this card is in the same Zone as Ominous Serpent, no attacks can be directed towards Ominous Serpent.

name: Ominous Serpent
effect: +1 Guard and +1 Vitality for every Demon Grunt that you control that is in the same Zone.

name: Child of Baphomet
effect: Each time a Demon-type Creature is summoned, add 1 Counter to this card. This card gains +1 Vitality, +1 Strength, and +1 Guard for every Counter.

name: Peasant Cadus
effect: When Peasant Cadus is summoned, you may add 1 Brotherly Spirit Marco from your Deck to your hand.

name: Brotherly Spirit Marco
effect: While Peasant Cadus is in play, this card can be summoned with no Lifeblood cost and can be summoned from the dead for the original Lifeblood cost.

name: Reaper Apprentice
effect: When a Creature is destroyed as a result of battle, add 1 Counter to this card. This card gains +2 Strength and +1 Vitality for every Counter.

name: Death, the Grim Reaper
effect: Once per turn, the player may pay 10 Mana to destroy one Creature on the field or to revive one Creature from the dead and place it in their Basecamp. While this card is in play, the player gains 5 Lifeblood every time a Creature is destroyed as a result of battle.
